name: Harissa
keywords: harissa, chili paste, Mediterranean, North African, spicy, condiment, sauce, dip, spread, guajillo chili, roasted red capsicum, tomato paste, garlic, coriander, cumin, smoked paprika, cayenne, lemon juice, olive oil, vegetarian, vegan, easy recipe
description: Simple and easy to make Mediterranean harissa sauce that is used in many recipes but is also great on sandwiches.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut open the chilis and remove the stems and seeds. Soak in hot water for 20m
recipeInstructions.name: Prep Chilis

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients and blitz in a blender until smooth as. Taste for seasoning and add exteas as required. Thats it!
recipeInstructions.name: Blitz

notes: Easy to make and easy to store. Spoon into ice cube trays and freeze for later. Also stores in the fridge for weeks.
Combine with other chilis for different flavors or hotter ones for more heat.
